entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.0°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
